[Speak with Animals](/Spells.aspx?ID=1680)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 358 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Etaris](/Deities.aspx?ID=624), [Green Faith](/Deities.aspx?ID=298), [Rowdrosh](/Deities.aspx?ID=652)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) skill with [animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=9). The spell doesn't make them more friendly than normal. Cunning animals are likely to be terse and evasive, while less intelligent ones often make inane comments.

text: Speak with Animals Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 358 2.0 Tradition Primal Deities Etaris, Green Faith, Rowdrosh Duration 1 hour --- You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with animals. The spell doesn't make them more friendly than normal. Cunning animals are likely to be terse and evasive, while less intelligent ones often make inane comments.
